changes.detail: Integrated useLocale() hook in component to retrieve current locale
Replaced 4 instances of hardcoded 'en-US' locale string with dynamic locale variable
locations: meeting card display - toLocaleDateString() for month abbreviation
selected meeting modal - toLocaleDateString() for month abbreviation

patterns_discovered.description: Multiple instances of hardcoded 'en-US' locale parameter across date/time formatting functions
patterns_discovered.impact: Breaks internationalization support - dates/times always display in US English format regardless of user locale

patterns_discovered.description: Project uses custom useLocale hook to manage locale context, indicating centralized i18n strategy
patterns_discovered.prevalence: Demonstrated by hook import and usage
patterns_discovered.impact: Enables consistent locale handling across components when properly implemented

patterns_discovered.description: Task is part of larger effort to remove hardcoded locales across codebase (subtask-8 suggests multiple similar fixes)

gotchas_discovered.description: Same hardcoded locale appears in multiple functions and template locations within single component
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Required thorough file scan to locate all 4 instances; easy to miss some if not careful

gotchas_discovered.description: Hardcoded locales embedded within JSX template expressions alongside date formatting logic
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Requires understanding component structure to identify all date formatting calls

gotchas_discovered.description: Solution depends on useLocale hook existing and functioning properly in the project
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Should verify hook implementation before applying changes

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully replaced all 4 hardcoded 'en-US' locale strings with dynamic locale from useLocale hook

recommendations.recommendation: Establish linting rule to prevent hardcoded locale strings in future code
recommendations.rationale: Current approach required manual search; automation could prevent regression

recommendations.recommendation: Add test cases for multiple locales in date/time formatting functions
recommendations.rationale: Changes affect user-facing formatting; should verify correct output for different locales

recommendations.recommendation: Document useLocale hook usage pattern and locale management strategy
recommendations.rationale: Would help other developers understand when and how to use locale hook

recommendations.recommendation: Consider extracting date/time formatting functions to utility module
recommendations.rationale: formatTime and formatDate functions could be reused across components with locale support

recommendations.recommendation: Continue systematic replacement of hardcoded locales across remaining components
recommendations.rationale: Task is part of larger i18n improvement effort; maintain momentum
